protocol.interface: l This interface allows a client to alter the palette of a server side decoration.

interface.name: org_kde_kwin_server_decoration_palette
interface.description: This interface allows a client to alter the palette of a server side decoration.

request.name: set_palette

description.summary: Set a on the server side window decoration

request.description: Color scheme that should be applied to the window decoration. Absolute file path, or name of palette in the user's config directory. The server may choose not to follow the requested style.

arg.name: palette
arg.summary: Absolute file path, or name of palette in the user's config directory
